titleStmt.title: A discourse shewing, that the spirit of parliaments, with a council in the intervals, is not to be trusted for a settlement: lest it introduce monarchy, and persecution for conscience. By James Harrington.
titleStmt.author: Harrington, James, 1611-1677.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.C. for Henry Fletcher, at the three gilt Cups neer the west-end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the three gilt Cups neer the west-end of Pauls
